issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: Signifies completion of tasks, info requests, etc.
resolution.name: Completed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: Currently we return the set of IPs in the same order and this does not balance the load as clients always pick the first one in the set.
fields.summary: ELB dns resolution should be in round-robin basis

comments.body: To test, set number of VMs per ELB more than 2. Then try resolving the ELB's dns name, using the UFS as dns server. For each request, it should return the IPs in round-robin order.

[~spark],

To test this, do you need 2 or more ELBs or instances attached to the ELB?  From my testing so far, I see the IPs flipping back and forth between two ELBs, but only one IP when there is only one ELB:
{code}
## two ELBs ##
[root@c-02 ~]# eulb-describe-lbs NginxLoadBalancers --show-long --region devops-admin@region-1
LOAD_BALANCER	NginxLoadBalancers	NginxLoadBalancers-000693176866.lb.c-02.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com			{interval=60,target=HTTP:80/,timeout=2,healthy-threshold=3,unhealthy-threshold=3}	one,two			i-c6422ef7,i-5d6398f7	{protocol=HTTP,lb-port=80,instance-protocol=HTTP,instance-port=80}					{owner-alias=000770154596,group-name=euca-internal-000693176866-NginxLoadBalancers}		2015-09-21T20:59:23.206Z	internet-facing
euca-prod-1-82:~ haroldspencerjr$ dig NginxLoadBalancers-000693176866.lb.c-02.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com

; <<>> DiG 9.10.2 <<>> NginxLoadBalancers-000693176866.lb.c-02.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com

;; ANSWER SECTION:

NginxLoadBalancers-000693176866.lb.c-02.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com. 57 IN A 10.111.76.1

;; AUTHORITY SECTION:
c-02.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com.	60 IN NS c-02.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com.

;; ADDITIONAL SECTION:

{code}
## one ELB ##

[~hspencer] You need more than one ELB (servo) VMs to test (your test with 2 VMs is good). Because the upstream DNS server is doing its own round-robin, you need to direct the query to the UFS.

Fixed.

Eucalyptus Version: {{4.2.0-0.0.23890.654.20150918git84e694a.el6}}

*Steps*

# Set up Eucalyptus 4.2 (4.2.0-0.0.23890.654.20150918git84e694a.el6) with Eucalyptus DNS enabled - [hspencer-1321|http://jenkins.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/job/Quick%20Launch%20Master/1321/]
# Created 'devops' account, and added access and secret keys to 'devops/admin' user
# Created ELB, then autoscaling group.  Linked autoscaling group to ELB:
{code}
[root@c-02 ~]# eulb-describe-lbs --region devops-admin@region-1 --show-long
LOAD_BALANCER	NginxLoadBalancers	NginxLoadBalancers-000693176866.lb.c-02.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com			{interval=60,target=HTTP:80/,timeout=2,healthy-threshold=3,unhealthy-threshold=3}	one,two			i-c6422ef7,i-5d6398f7	{protocol=HTTP,lb-port=80,instance-protocol=HTTP,instance-port=80}					{owner-alias=000770154596,group-name=euca-internal-000693176866-NginxLoadBalancers}		2015-09-21T20:59:23.206Z	internet-facing
[root@c-02 ~]# euscale-describe-auto-scaling-groups --show-long --region devops-admin@region-1
AUTO-SCALING-GROUP	NginxScalingGroup	NginxConfigV2	one,two	2015-09-21T15:33:59.731Z	NginxLoadBalancers	EC2	2	4	2	300	0			arn:aws:autoscaling::000693176866:autoScalingGroup:ba624b96-3ea9-46ee-b2cc-ea82b985b5dc:autoScalingGroupName/NginxScalingGroup	Default
INSTANCE	i-c6422ef7	one	InService	Healthy	NginxConfigV2
INSTANCE	i-5d6398f7	two	InService	Healthy	NginxConfigV2
{code}
# Confirmed curl worked against ELB:
{code}
[root@c-02 ~]# curl -I NginxLoadBalancers-000693176866.lb.c-02.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Server: nginx/1.9.3 (Ubuntu)
Date: Wed, 23 Sep 2015 16:53:09 GMT
Content-Type: text/html
Content-Length: 612
Last-Modified: Tue, 22 Sep 2015 14:11:27 GMT
ETag: "5601618f-264"
Accept-Ranges: bytes
{code}
# From remote client, ran dig against the UFS (Eucalyptus DNS) to confirm proper round-robin behavior:
{code}
euca-prod-1-82:~ haroldspencerjr$ dig NginxLoadBalancers-000693176866.lb.c-02.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com @10.111.1.210
